description:
Hello, I`m Amaya Kanaka`s younger brother, Souta.
I apologize for any trouble that my sister may have caused you.
Continuing from last time, everyone is over at our house,
but it`s not like my sister is going to clean her room, so she`s doing whatever she wants to.
I`ve received quite a bit of unfair treatment.
It was a day that I learned how to entertain guests even though I`m a junior high student.
Sigh...
Source: crunchyroll
